JobFullDesc: The safety of our candidates and team members is our top priority. During the COVID-19 pandemic, our workforce transitioned to working from home, with all interviewing and onboarding being conducted virtually until further notice.We are looking for a Director of QA to join us at Zynga Austin in creating Star Wars: Hunters™, a competitive arena combat game for the Nintendo Switch system and mobile devices. Star Wars: Hunters will bring players together to engage in thrilling, squad-based, multiplayer battles featuring a diverse array of distinctive new Star Wars characters.The Director of QA is responsible for defining and implementing the QA strategy across the studio. They will be an excellent collaborator, tactical and strategically minded. They will have experience with large projects crossing various levels of QA from processes, localisation, functional, automation and performance. This an excellent opportunity to start paving the way in the gaming world for a more agile shift left approach.Main Responsibilities:You will be responsible for:·        The strategy, design,
